thread.title: Motorist attacked on N3 Marlboro off-ramp
thread.title_full: Motorist attacked on N3 Marlboro off-ramp | News24

author: news24.com
title: Motorist attacked on N3 Marlboro off-ramp
text:
Johannesburg â€“ A motorist was stabbed and robbed of his wallet on the N3 in Johannesburg on Wednesday morning, paramedics said.
He pulled over due to engine problems near the Marlboro off-ramp when he was attacked, ER24 spokesperson Russel Meiring said.
The man sustained stab wounds to his arms and hands and called paramedics, who found him sitting near his car. He was taken to a local hospital.
